name: 3D After Burner II
synopsis: 3D After Burner II is a completely re-mastered version of the arcade classic. Pilot your F-14D fighter through enemy territory blasting away squadrons of enemy fighters. This arcade masterpiece now features stereoscopic 3D, a choice of real arcade cabinets, new difficulty settings as well as visual adjustments options. Blast your way through 23 stages to unlock a special mode with even more gameplay enhancements.
